title: Couchsurfing may retain your data after deactivation for legitimate business purposes

tosdr.case: This service retains rights to your content even after you stop using your account
tosdr.tldr:
"may retain certain information as required by law, for legitimate 
business purposes and to protect member safety." They say they will hold data from already 
closed accounts in order to help them combat fraud on the platform.
